name: Submersible Nuclear Fusion
text: Fusion Summon 1 Machine Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling the Fusion Materials listed on it into the Deck, from among your cards on the field, in your GY, and/or your face-up banished cards. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Submersible" monster that is banished to your hand.
